items.sentence: We don\'t get along well with our neighbors.
Tom told me that he got his guitar for free.
We\'ll have to check every one of them, Tom.
We\'ll have to wait and see if that happens.
I wish you\'d quit doing what you\'re doing.
I\'m pretty sure Tom used to live in Boston.
I\'m probably the worst French speaker here.
Tom thought he was going to enjoy the party.
Tom isn\'t here yet, but we expect him soon.
Please let me off in front of that building.
Please make sure your seat belt is fastened.
Please refrain from smoking cigarettes here.
Please tell Tom he needs to be here by 2:30.
Tom told me that the heater wasn\'t working.
Could you please confirm the price by email?
I\'m pretty sure that\'s not why Tom did it.
Tell Tom when you\'re going to be in Boston.
I wanted Tom to tell me about his childhood.
I was able to do that much quicker than Tom.
Is it true you\'re going to study in Boston?
